text:
"That, of course, on the view you take of clairvoyance..."

"Oh, yeah," said Richard, "it seemed very natural at the time, though not of course to his face."

passages.full_quote: "Well, yes," <used>said Richard, "it seemed very natural at the time, b</used>ut now that I... think about it, I have to admit that it was a bit dumbfounding."

passages.full_quote: In fact it looked a lot like the controversial keel which had helped the Australians win the America's Cup in 1983, and this resemblance had been much remarked upon <used>at the time, though not of course to his face</used>
